title: Miles Morales Gets His Spider-Verse Suit - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.30.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about the DOPE Spider-Verse suit in Spider-Man: Miles Morales, PS5 accessibility features, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:03 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Extra Life is happening NEXT WEEK!
COMMUNITY STREAM HOSTING STARTS FRIDAY NOV 6 @ 1PM PT
KINDA FUNNY EXTRA LIFE SAT NOVEMBER 7
10am-10pm
kindafunny.com/extralife to sign up or donate!
First Impressions of Dark Pictures: Little Hope is up over at Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Bless is streaming the Ghost of Tsushima Raid today. 4 pm PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Greg is streaming Halloween in Animal Crossing tomorrow @ 5 pm PT!
Next week, PSILY is on Friday!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:09:40 - Miles Morales Gets His Into the Spider-Verse Suit
00:18:0 - Sony Buying CrunchyRoll? Adele Ankers @ IGN
00:20:40 - Sony Not Giving Up on VR, Gene park @ The Washington Post
00:36:30 - Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope Review Round-Up
00:45:40 -  Ad  
00:50:18 - Everwild’s Creative Director Resigns, Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:51:30 - Could there be an underlying issue with MS game development that we don't know about? - Best Friends Q:TheSheepWhisper
01:00:30 - PS5’s Accessibility features, James O’Connor @ GameSpot
01:03:39 - Out today
01:05:15 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman(twitch.tv/RobbyRobPlays)
:: - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Imran
TUE: Tim/Tam!
WED: Greg and Gary Whitta
THURS: Blessing and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
